sn23.12:1.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:
sn23.12:1.3: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘Māra-like nature’.
sn23.12:1.5: “Rādha, form has a Māra-like nature. Feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness have a Māra-like nature.
sn23.12:1.7: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
